titleStmt.title: A proclamation signifying his Maiesties pleasure, to confirme by all meanes the estates of his subiects against all defects in their assurances, and all concealed titles.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-hall the xxij. day of Aprill, in the seuenth yeere of our reigne ..
The first sheet is partly in two settings; line 1 of text has (1) "alvvayes" or (2) "alwayes". The second sheet is in two settings; line 1 of imprint ends (1) "Kings" or (2) "most".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
